oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Agriculture in Hungary – Past, Present, Future
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Drexler, Dora
Dezseny, Zoltan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hungary
Country reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Update on the structure and status of the organic sector in Hungary, the factors that motivate customers to buy organic products,the future trends and the role of ÖMKi for organic farming research in Hungary.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL) and International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Drexler, Dora and Dezseny, Zoltan (2013) Organic Agriculture in Hungary – Past, Present, Future. In: The World of Organic Agriculture - Statistics and Emerging Trends 2013. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL) and International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements (IFOAM), Germany, pp. 239-241.
